titles.title: Oh How I Love This Blessed Book

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how I love this blessed book The story of redeeming grace Love letter of my Bridegroom's heart And mirror of my Savior's face{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how I love this blessed Book My check book on the bank above Deed of my heav'nly heritage And dying will of Him I love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how I love this blessed Book Bright telescope through which I view The wonders of the world to come And gaze on glories ever new{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how I love this blessed Book My Guide Book all my earthly way The lamp that cheers my darkest night The sunshine of my brightest day{/lang-eng}
